code: var createLifeRenderSystem=function createLifeRenderSystem(){var redLife,blackLife,LIFE_WIDTH,LIFE_HEIGHT,LIFE_START_X,LIFE_START_Y,LIFE_MARGIN_RIGHT;var tex;return{init:function init(_ref,_ref2){var trayState=_ref.trayState;var width=_ref2.width,assets=_ref2.assets,height=_ref2.height;var atlas=assets.foodInPot;redLife=atlas.findRegion("tim_do",-1);blackLife=atlas.findRegion("tim_den",-1);LIFE_WIDTH=width/12;LIFE_HEIGHT=LIFE_WIDTH*redLife.height/redLife.width;LIFE_START_X=width*0.3;LIFE_START_Y=height/9;LIFE_MARGIN_RIGHT=width/9;},update:function update(delta,_ref3,_ref4){var life=_ref3.life;var batch=_ref4.batch,width=_ref4.width,height=_ref4.height,camera=_ref4.camera;batch.setProjection(camera.combined);batch.begin();batch.setColor(1,1,1,1);for(var i=0;i<life.length;i++){if(life[i].red){tex=redLife;}else{tex=blackLife;}tex.draw(batch,LIFE_START_X+LIFE_MARGIN_RIGHT*i,LIFE_START_Y,LIFE_WIDTH,LIFE_HEIGHT);}batch.end();}};};export default createLifeRenderSystem;
